name: Powerpoint Maze Kaboom!
description:
Powerpoint Maze Kaboom Early Access 

Can only be opened on Windows (unless you have PowerPoint on your Mac, Linux)

Do not recommend playing on Android and IOS because of compatibility problems

Recommend Newest Version of Powerpoint because some features might not be implemented yet on older versions

All versions like Office Home, Professional and etc are Compatible? (I have Home Version so that definitely works)
